body_html:
There's not too much to change:

  1. Update this line to refer to the new commit for gRPC.
  2. Copy each of the file lists from the corresponding cc_library in grpc.BUILD to the add_library() blocks in grpc/CMakeLists.txt.
body_text:
There's not too much to change:

Update this line to refer to the new commit for gRPC.
Copy each of the file lists from the corresponding cc_library in grpc.BUILD to the add_library() blocks in grpc/CMakeLists.txt.
body:
There's not too much to change:

1. Update [this line](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/89059e6f0b2788b624e744afc21ba2472523a250/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/external/grpc.cmake#L6) to refer to the new commit for gRPC.
2. Copy each of the file lists from the corresponding `cc_library` in `grpc.BUILD` to the `add_library()` blocks in [`grpc/CMakeLists.txt`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/89059e6f0b2788b624e744afc21ba2472523a250/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/patches/grpc/CMakeLists.txt).
